description:
At a time when a subset of the nation`s students is becoming radicalized, Hazama meets a college student activist named Imagami Eri. After treating her injury, Eri and Hazama develop a curious friendship. One day, Hazama hears on the news that the police is routing out activists in Gunma, the same prefecture where Eri`d sent him a postcard from...
Source: crunchyroll
